bibl.title: Sprang Hairnets in the Katoen Natie Collection.
bibl.note: Presents a group of 45 hairnets from Egypt in the Katoen Natie Collection, Antwerp. - 1. Measurements. - 2. Material. - 3. Central part. - 4. Decorative side borders. - 5. Narrowing at the top. - 6. The browband. - 7. The warp ends on the front. - 8. The warp loops at the back side. - 9. Drawstring on the back. - 10. Securing the meeting line. - 11. Drawstring at the top. - 12. Chained ridge. - 13. Date [between the 5th and middle of the 7th century]. - 14. Conclusion.

bibl.title: assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.

bibl.seg: Kwaspen Anne, Sprang Hairnets in the Katoen Natie Collection.

Antoine De Moor and CÃ¤cilia Fluck (Edd.), assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009 (Tielt, 2011) pp. 70-95, 2 tabl., 23 figg. coul.

Presents a group of 45 hairnets from Egypt in the Katoen Natie Collection, Antwerp. - 1. Measurements. - 2. Material. - 3. Central part. - 4. Decorative side borders. - 5. Narrowing at the top. - 6. The browband. - 7. The warp ends on the front. - 8. The warp loops at the back side. - 9. Drawstring on the back. - 10. Securing the meeting line. - 11. Drawstring at the top. - 12. Chained ridge. - 13. Date [between the 5th and middle of the 7th century]. - 14. Conclusion.
